snippet.title: BOUNTY STAR | Gameplay Overview
snippet.description:
Ben Ruiz, creator and director of Bounty Star, talks about what to expect from the game in this developer walkthrough.

Bounty Star comes to Xbox, PlayStation, and Steam in 2024. Wishlist on Steam now: 

You play as Clementine McKinney, an ex-soldier without purpose or peace, as she gets back into a mech, fights bands of mercenaries, and learns to care about the post-post Apocalyptic desert home she intended to rot in.

Developed by DINOGOD. Published by Annapurna Interactive. 

© Annapurna Interactive, 2023
